short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to make calls on your extension, send SMS messages, access your company phone book and view recent calls.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Brings all your company contacts together in one easy to use app. 
Have a phonebook in a dialler which allows you to make calls on your extension, send SMS messages and view recent calls.

Version 2.3.1 now includes:

- Updated Interface with Number Search.
- Import a Phonebook
- Click to dial on websites.
- Recent call history.
- Conversation based SMS messaging.
- Company contacts / phone book.
- Call & SMS Notifications.
- CRM Integration (Screen popping).
- Select an Outgoing CallerId now with identifiers.

If you don't have a WigWag account sign up for one at wigwag.co.uk
